cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port for CU to 0, which is out of valid port range (1-65535), will cause connection failure to DU and prevent F1 interface establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting local_n_address to the same value as remote_n_address (127.0.0.5) creates an IP address conflict, making the DU unreachable and causing routing failures in the F1 interface.
